analysis.description:
Slot.distributeRemaining (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#371-381) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- fund.transfer(DIV_DIST) (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#376-377)
	- msg.sender.transfer(GAS_REFUND) (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#380-381)

Slot.awardPrizes (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#339-363) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winnerIndex == jackpotNumber

Slot.buyTicketsFor (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#302-317) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ticket.mint(_beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#314)

Slot.awardPrizes has external calls inside a loop:
	- participants[gameIndex][winnerIndex % SIZE].transfer(prizes[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#355-356)

Slot.refundPlayersAfterVeryLongGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- participants[gameIndex][i].transfer(PRICE) (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#406)

Reentrancy in Slot.buyTicketsFor (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#302-317):
	External calls:
	- ticket.mint(_beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#314)
	External calls sending eth:
	- addParticipant(_beneficiary,numberOfTickets) (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#314-316)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- counter (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#314-316)
	- gameIndex (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#314-316)
	- gameStartedAtBlock (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#314-316)
	- jackpotAmount (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#314-316)
	- participants (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#314-316)

SlotTicket.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#240)
SlotTicket.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#239-240)
SlotTicket.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#240-241)
SlotTicket.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#241)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/15/0xd6b3d9e44f767f0c178f60d24fb186ba49bc444a.sol#340-341:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
